content:
TITLE: Initializing and Using Mailchimp Marketing API in Node.js DESCRIPTION: Example of how to set up and use the Mailchimp Marketing API client in Node.js. It demonstrates configuring the client with API key and server prefix, and making a simple API call to the ping endpoint. SOURCE: https://github.com/mailchimp/mailchimp-marketing-node/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` const mailchimp = require('@mailchimp/mailchimp_marketing'); mailchimp.setConfig({ apiKey: 'YOUR_API_KEY', server: 'YOUR_SERVER_PREFIX', }); async function callPing() { const response = await mailchimp.ping.get(); console.log(response); } callPing(); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Mailchimp Marketing API with Basic Auth in Node.js DESCRIPTION: Example of how to configure the Mailchimp Marketing API client using Basic Authentication. It requires an API key and server prefix. SOURCE: https://github.com/mailchimp/mailchimp-marketing-node/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` mailchimp.setConfig({ apiKey: 'YOUR_API_KEY', server: 'YOUR_SERVER_PREFIX', }); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Mailchimp Marketing API with OAuth2 in Node.js DESCRIPTION: Example of how to configure the Mailchimp Marketing API client using OAuth2 Authentication. It requires an access token and server prefix. SOURCE: https://github.com/mailchimp/mailchimp-marketing-node/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` mailchimp.setConfig({ accessToken: 'YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN', server: 'YOUR_SERVER_PREFIX', }); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Mailchimp Marketing Node.js Client DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Mailchimp Marketing Node.js client library using npm. SOURCE: https://github.com/mailchimp/mailchimp-marketing-node/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm install @mailchimp/mailchimp_marketing ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Mailchimp API Endpoints Table DESCRIPTION: Markdown table listing all available API endpoints with their corresponding method names and paths relative to the base URL https://server.api.mailchimp.com/3.0 SOURCE: https://github.com/mailchimp/mailchimp-marketing-node/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Method | Endpoint | | ---------- | -------- | | **accountExport.getAccountExports** | /account-exports/{export_id} | | **accountExports.listAccountExports** | /account-exports | | **accountExports.createAccountExport** | /account-exports | | **activityFeed.getChimpChatter** | /activity-feed/chimp-chatter | | **authorizedApps.list** | /authorized-apps | | **authorizedApps.get** | /authorized-apps/{app_id} | [...truncated for brevity...] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Listing Mailchimp Marketing Node API Endpoints in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This code snippet presents a table of Mailchimp Marketing Node API method names and their corresponding API endpoints. It covers various functionalities such as e-commerce, Facebook ads, file management, landing pages, lists, reporting, and more. SOURCE: https://github.com/mailchimp/mailchimp-marketing-node/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | **ecommerce.addPromoRules** | /ecommerce/stores/{store_id}/promo-rules | | **ecommerce.setStoreCustomer** | /ecommerce/stores/{store_id}/customers/{customer_id} | | **ecommerce.addProductVariant** | /ecommerce/stores/{store_id}/products/{product_id}/variants/{variant_id} | | **facebookAds.list** | /facebook-ads | | **facebookAds.getAd** | /facebook-ads/{outreach_id} | | **fileManager.deleteFile** | /file-manager/files/{file_id} | | **fileManager.deleteFolder** | /file-manager/folders/{folder_id} | | **fileManager.files** | /file-manager/files | | **fileManager.getFile** | /file-manager/files/{file_id} | | **fileManager.listFolders** | /file-manager/folders | | **fileManager.getFolder** | /file-manager/folders/{folder_id} | | **fileManager.updateFile** | /file-manager/files/{file_id} | | **fileManager.updateFolder** | /file-manager/folders/{folder_id} | | **fileManager.upload** | /file-manager/files | | **fileManager.createFolder** | /file-manager/folders | | **landingPages.deletePage** | /landing-pages/{page_id} | | **landingPages.getAll** | /landing-pages | | **landingPages.getPage** | /landing-pages/{page_id} | | **landingPages.getPageContent** | /landing-pages/{page_id}/content | | **landingPages.updatePage** | /landing-pages/{page_id} | | **landingPages.create** | /landing-pages | | /lists/{list_id}/surveys/{survey_id}/actions/unpublish | | **templateFolders.remove** | /template-folders/{folder_id} | | **templateFolders.list** | /template-folders | | **templateFolders.get** | /template-folders/{folder_id} | | **templateFolders.update** | /template-folders/{folder_id} | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Listing Mailchimp Marketing API Endpoints in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This snippet provides a table of API endpoints for various operations in the Mailchimp Marketing Node.js library. It includes endpoints for managing template folders, templates, and verified domains. SOURCE: https://github.com/mailchimp/mailchimp-marketing-node/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` | **templateFolders.create** | /template-folders | | **templates.deleteTemplate** | /templates/{template_id} | | **templates.list** | /templates | | **templates.getTemplate** | /templates/{template_id} | | **templates.getDefaultContentForTemplate** | /templates/{template_id}/default-content | | **templates.updateTemplate** | /templates/{template_id} | | **templates.create** | /templates | | **verifiedDomains.createVerifiedDomain** | /verified-domains | | **verifiedDomains.deleteDomain** | /verified-domains/{domain_name} | | **verifiedDomains.getDomain** | /verified-domains/{domain_name} | | **verifiedDomains.getVerifiedDomainsAll** | /verified-domains | | **verifiedDomains.submitDomainVerification** | /verified-domains/{domain_name}/actions/verify | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adding setDefaultTimeoutMs Method to Node Client in Transactional SDK DESCRIPTION: Documentation for version 1.0.42 of the Transactional SDK which added a setDefaultTimeoutMs method to the node client, allowing users to override the default API request timeout of 5 minutes. SOURCE: https://github.com/mailchimp/mailchimp-marketing-node/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ### 1.0.42 * Added a `setDefaultTimeoutMs` method to the node client. This allows users to override the default timeout for API requests, which is set to 5 minutes by default. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Mailchimp Marketing Library Links with Icons in HTML DESCRIPTION: This HTML snippet displays links to Mailchimp Marketing libraries in different programming languages (Node.js, PHP, Ruby, and Python) using icons. Each link is represented by an image of the programming language's logo. SOURCE: https://github.com/mailchimp/mailchimp-marketing-node/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ```
```
